name: OR_LNLG_DEFIB
description: The OR_LNLG_DEFIB table contains information about defibrillator power and defibrillator time applied during IntraOp.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DEFIB_POWER
columns.description: Document the power settings for the defibrillator.

columns.name: DEFIB_APPLIED_DTTM
columns.description: Document when the defibrillator was applied to the patient.

columns.name: DEFIB_APPLIED_DT
columns.description: Stores the date defibrillation was performed during surgery.

columns.name: DEFIB_APPLIED_TM
columns.description: Stores the time defibrillation was performed during surgery.

columns.name: DEFIB_MODIFIER_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the modification made to the defibrillator.

columns.name: DEFIB_SERIAL_NUMBER
columns.description: This item stores the defibrillator serial number.

columns.name: DEFIB_PAD_SIZE
columns.description: This item stores the defibrillator pad size.

columns.name: DEFIB_PAD_LOCATION_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the defibrillator pad location.

columns.name: DEFIB_END_TM
columns.description: This item stores the time defibrillation was ended.
